feature.label: Example plotting actor Feature
feature.description:
This is an example feature, to illustrate dynamic Triquetrum extensions.
In this case it's about adding an extra actor and its palette contribution, for an XYPlotActor.
As the implementation is based on Eclipse Nebula XYGraph, this dependency bundle is also contained in the feature definition.
